reviewText: Everything on here was written by Buster,a good thing because he was a strong composer for guitar-good enough to give the likes of Tommy Emmanuel a serious run for his money. As usual,Buster does an excellent job of leaving you in no doubt as to how to play these tunes,you just provide the time and practice. Stand out tunes for me were 'basicaly Bresh'(a Travis/western swing tour de force) and ......oh what the hell-they're ALL great-buy it!
